petNameAdd:
1) State of Assam
    Advocate - D K Deka

acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: Accused Shri Birendra Mahato is produced on the strength of production warrant. Co-accused Md. Halem Ali is present.          It is a case which was on receipt of written ejahar initially registered as Khatkhati Police Station Case No. 83/2017 under section 8 of the POCSO Act and as such on arrest of the accused persons were produced before me being Special Judge. The charge sheet was submitted against the accused persons under section 354 of the IPC. After filing charge sheet, inadvertently the case was posted for consideration of charge. It is pertinent to mentioned that the charge sheet was not taken to my notice. Again inadvertently charge was framed under section 18 of the POCSO Act R/W section 4 of the POCSO Act instead of sending the case to the learned Chief Judicial Magistrate, Diphu, Karbi Anglong for disposal.          For the reasons stated above, let this case be sent to the learned Chief Judicial Magistrate, Diphu, Karbi Anglong for disposal. The accused Md. Halem Ali is asked to appear before the court of learned Chief Judicial Magistrate, Diphu, Karbi Anglong on 06.11.2019. The accused Shri Birendra Mahato is send back to the District Jail, Diphu, Karbi Anglong.
